question: Japanese researchers have proposed to use which material to eliminate space junk?
explanation:
The space researchers of Japan are exploring the possibilities of using wooden components to reduce the excess space junk. They have proposed that using wooden components in space mission would burn up upon reentry to Earthâ€™s atmosphere.
In this regard, Sumitomo Forestry which is a 400-year-old Japanese woodworking company has partnered with Kyoto University to develop the technology.
